attributes.action: Introduce legislation to allow peppercorn and other small rents to be increased to reflect the economic value of the benefit gained
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where small rents were set decades ago these no longer cover the costs of providing the benefits gained by the beneficiary/ies. Legislation that permitted such rents to be increased in line with the appropriate price index would provide a more just income for the provider of the benefit to cover the cost of its provision.
